content: this legal text provides an overview of a specific case referred to as case n° 1612021 without disclosing the names of the parties involved one party is owed 134200 euro and is seeking to recover this amount from another party the text explains the progress of the case from march 30 2021 to june 14 2021 which is a total of 76 days the case involves a legal process called judicial division allocation assets and the division of assets among coheirs the parties involved have decided to allocate the assets in a nonhomogeneous manner a mediation meeting was held on june 14 2021 where the parties reached a conciliatory agreement regarding the sale of an apartment and garage for €68000 the payment would be made in installments with the remaining amount paid upon the execution of a notarial deed the parties also agreed on the payment of mediation costs and other expenses the conciliatory agreement is considered enforceable and the proceedings were declared closed
